word: Free to Act in Concert With Them.--I am deeply interested in the W.C.T.U. It is the Lord's pleasure that you should feel free to act in concert with them. . . . I am not afraid that you will lose your interest, or backslide from the truth because you interest yourself in this people who have taken such a noble stand for the temperance question, and I shall urge our people, and those not of our faith, to help us in carrying forward the work of Christian temperance....
